Html:
Hi, I like your software.

Have plan support Visual Studio 2012?

Hi,

You can create snippet for vs2010 then copy it to vs2013 snippets folder,
In my computer for c# snippets folder for vs2013: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 12.0\VC#\Snippets\1033\Visual C#

I have tested and it works.
